mosinstall.name: iClude
mosinstall.author: Joern Gerken
mosinstall.description: Module to display any php-file via include or, selectable, any html-file in an iframe.

param.name: moduleclass_sfx_ic
param.label: Module CSS Klasse
param.description: Enhancement of the module.css.class [table.moduletable], which allows more individual designs.

param.name: switch_ic
param.label: Kind of integration
param.description: Kind of integration. Iframe or php-include.

param.name: pfad_iframeic
param.label: Path iframe
param.description: If iframe, insert the complete path of the HTML-file (e.g.: http://www.domain.com/page.html).

param.name: pfad_ic
param.label: Link include
param.description: If include, insert the complete link of the to be included php-file

param.name: scrolling
param.label: Scrollbars
param.description: Display (or not ;-) horizontal and vertical scrollbars
